content: HELLO, THIS IS THE BEST DEAL FOR HOME UPGRADES! CLICK TO WIN A FREE AC SERVICE. CALL NOW FOR DISCOUNTED APPLIANCE REPAIRS, JUST $20! MESSAGE BACK YES TO CLAIM.
Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How may I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
WIN A BRAND NEW FURNACE! JUST REPLY YES TO THIS NUMBER. 100S OF WINNERS PICKED WEEKLY. CALL 1-800-SCAM FOR MORE DETAILS.

This conversation appears to be unrelated to our services. If you need assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs in your home, please let us know. Otherwise, we may need to end this conversation.
reason: Detected spam: repeated unsolicited promotional messages.
